welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Heywood, a charming town known for its historic architecture and friendly locals. Get ready to explore and experience all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily used by low-cost carriers for European and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly used for long-haul flights to destinations in Asia, Africa, and the Americas.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves mainly low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
